title: Russia claims to have taken full control of Mariupol - The Associated Press
content: Russia claims to have taken full control of Mariupol  The Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: POKROVSK, Ukraine (AP) â€” Russia claimed to have captured Mariupol on Friday in what would be its biggest victory yet in its war with Ukraine, after a nearly three-month siege that reduced much of the strategic port city to a smoking ruin, with over 20,000 civilians feared dead .
